title: 10 Saddest Goodbyes In One Piece, Ranked
author: CBR Staff
description: Article ranking the saddest goodbyes in One Piece, with Vivi's farewell from Alabasta ranking #4. Analyzes how Vivi became an integral member of the crew and her difficult choice between piracy and royal duty.

title: The 10 Saddest Goodbyes In Anime, Ranked
author: CBR Staff
description: Cross-anime ranking article featuring Vivi's farewell as one of the saddest anime goodbyes. Describes it as 'bittersweet yet unforgettable, commemorating the lifelong friendship between Vivi and the Straw Hats.'

title: 10 One Piece Episodes That Made Us Cry Ugly Tears
author: CBR Staff
description: Article highlighting the most emotional One Piece episodes, featuring Episode 129 where Vivi says goodbye to her friends while choosing to fulfill her duties as princess.

title: 129: It All Began On That Day! Vivi Tells the Story of Her Adventure!
author: neverwatchedonepiece
description: Personal blog post analyzing Episode 129, with extensive commentary on Bon Clay's philosophy and character development, as well as Vivi's decision to stay. Highlights the quote 'Nakama are forever. And they have the mark to prove it.'

title: One Piece Calls Back to the Series' Most Beloved Moment in the Perfect Way
author: Screen Rant Staff
description: Analysis of how recent One Piece chapters (Chapter 1130) callback to the iconic X mark farewell from Episode 129, showing Vivi sending a message to the Straw Hats using the same symbol.

title: One Piece: Oda Just Dropped a Major Hint For Vivi's Strawhat Reunion
author: Game Rant Staff
description: Article discussing recent hints about Vivi's potential reunion with the Straw Hats, referencing the X mark symbolism established in Episode 129.

title: Straw Hats Farewell to Vivi Reanimated in the 4th WE ARE ONE Episode
author: Anime Corner Staff
description: News article about the reanimation of the iconic Vivi farewell scene from Episode 129 in the 'WE ARE ONE' collection, a project commemorating One Piece's 100th manga volume and 1000th anime episode.

title: One Piece, 129 & 130 WANNABE - Spoil Me Podcast
author: Spoil Me Podcast
description: Podcast episode discussing One Piece episodes 129 & 130, covering the crew's departure from Alabasta and Vivi's decision not to join, as well as the introduction of their new female crew member.

title: GOODBYE VIVI, HELLO ROBIN! One Piece Ep 129 & 130 REACTION & REVIEW
description: Video reaction and review of Episodes 129 and 130, covering Vivi's farewell and Robin's introduction to the crew.

title: One Piece - The Strawhat Pirates Say Goodbye To Vivi
description: Video clip of the iconic farewell scene from Episode 129 where the Straw Hats and Vivi exchange the X mark gesture.
